column4: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupportComponentsMultimediaWebCamerasLogitech <- I have a quickcam messenger, and I use Dapper Drake. How can I figure out what package/driver I should install (I heared it was supported in the latest linux kernels...)
ctrl+alt+f1 adamonline45 brings you in shell for start
That will eliminate any processor and memory overhead from gnome?
